00032 #ifndef __LWIP_API_MSG_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_API_MSG_H__
00034 
00035 #include "lwip/opt.h"
00036 #include "lwip/pbuf.h"
00037 #include "lwip/sys.h"
00038 
00039 #include "lwip/ip.h"
00040 
00041 #include "lwip/udp.h"
00042 #include "lwip/tcp.h"
00043 
00044 #include "lwip/api.h"
00045 
00046 enum api_msg_type {
00047   API_MSG_NEWCONN,
00048   API_MSG_DELCONN,
00049   
00050   API_MSG_BIND,
00051   API_MSG_CONNECT,
00052   API_MSG_DISCONNECT,
00053 
00054   API_MSG_LISTEN,
00055   API_MSG_ACCEPT,
00056 
00057   API_MSG_SEND,
00058   API_MSG_RECV,
00059   API_MSG_WRITE,
00060 
00061   API_MSG_CLOSE,
00062   
00063   API_MSG_MAX
00064 };
00065 
00066 struct api_msg_msg {
00067   struct netconn *conn;
00068   enum netconn_type conntype;
00069   union {
00070     struct pbuf *p;   
00071     struct  {
00072       struct ip_addr *ipaddr;
00073       u16_t port;
00074     } bc;
00075     struct {
00076       void *dataptr;
00077       u16_t len;
00078       unsigned char copy;
00079     } w;    
00080     sys_mbox_t mbox;
00081     u16_t len;
00082   } msg;
00083 };
00084 
00085 struct api_msg {
00086   enum api_msg_type type;
00087   struct api_msg_msg msg;
00088 };
00089 
00090 void api_msg_input(struct api_msg *msg);
00091 void api_msg_post(struct api_msg *msg);
00092 
00093 #endif /* __LWIP_API_MSG_H__ */
